unnormalised: ## Chai Pe Charcha: Bollywood's Latest Buzz is Spicier Than Masala!
normalised: ## Chai on Discussion: Bollywood's Latest Buzz is Spicier Than Masala!

unnormalised: Hey guys, grab your chai and samosas, because the Bollywood gossip mills are working overtime! The rumours are flying faster than a local train during rush hour in Mumbai.
normalised: Hey guys, grab your chai and samosas, because the Bollywood gossip mills are working overtime! The rumors are flying faster than a local train during rush hour in Mumbai.

unnormalised: First off, whispers are circulating about Deepika and Ranveer. Apparently, sources close to the power couple (think Karan Johar's inner circle types!) are saying they're planning a hush-hush anniversary celebration in the Maldives. Talk about keeping it classy! Remember how over-the-top their wedding was at Lake Como? This is supposed to be the total opposite. #DeepVeerGoals, or maybe #DeepVeerPrivacy? You decide!
normalised: First off, whispers are circulating about Deepika and Ranveer. Apparently, sources close to the power couple (think Karan Johar's inner circle types!) are saying they're planning a hush-hush anniversary celebration in the Maldives. Talk about keeping it classy! Remember how over-the-top their wedding was at Lake Como? This is supposed to be the total opposite. Hash Deep Veer Goals, or maybe Hash Deep Veer Privacy? You decide!

unnormalised: Then there’s the whole Ranbir-Alia drama. People are speculating about baby no. 2 already! Some reports even claim Alia was spotted at a famous children's clothing store in Bandra, buying all things pink. Is this confirmation? Hmm…suspicious, right? Maybe she's just getting gifts for cousin sister ki beti? Only time will tell.
normalised: Then there’s the whole Ranbir-Alia drama. People are speculating about baby number two already! Some reports even claim Alia was spotted at a famous children's clothing store in Bandra, buying all things pink. Is this confirmation? Hmm…suspicious, right? Maybe she's just getting gifts for cousin sister ki beti? Only time will tell.

unnormalised: And can we talk about the alleged rivalry brewing between Janhvi Kapoor and Sara Ali Khan? Apparently, they both auditioned for the lead role in the upcoming Karan Johar movie (surprise, surprise!) and things got a little…heated. Sources say there were some serious glares exchanged at a recent Filmfare awards after-party. Ouch! Reminds me of scenes straight outta "Student of the Year 2." Drama, drama, drama!
normalised: And can we talk about the alleged rivalry brewing between Janhvi Kapoor and Sara Ali Khan? Apparently, they both auditioned for the lead role in the upcoming Karan Johar movie (surprise, surprise!) and things got a little…heated. Sources say there were some serious glares exchanged at a recent Filmfare awards after-party. Ouch! Reminds me of scenes straight out of "Student of the Year two." Drama, drama, drama!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, back in smaller news, Vicky Kaushal was spotted exiting the Hinduja hospital after a checkup. Fans are speculating he's prepping for a rigorous action role, but honestly, maybe he just had a common cold? Let's not jump to conclusions, folks!
normalised: Meanwhile, back in smaller news, Vicky Kaushal was spotted exiting the Hinduja hospital after a checkup. Fans are speculating he's prepping for a rigorous action role, but honestly, maybe he just had a common cold? Let's not jump to conclusions, folks!

unnormalised: Finally, news is that Shah Rukh Khan is thinking of doing Don 3. It might happen in 2025.
normalised: Finally, news is that Shah Rukh Khan is thinking of doing Don three. It might happen in two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: So there you have it, folks. Enough Bollywood masala to last you through the week! Keep your ears to the ground and your chai hot, because you never know what juicy scoop will drop next!
normalised: So there you have it, folks. Enough Bollywood masala to last you through the week! Keep your ears to the ground and your chai hot, because you never know what juicy scoop will drop next!
